I released 4 new Python packages in the process of putting this together:

https://datasette.io/tools/openai-to-sqlite is a CLI for storing results of OpenAI API calls in SQLite. It supports the embeddings API:

openai-to-sqlite embeddings content.db \

title: Journalists (And Others) Should Leave Twitter. Here’s How They Can Get Started

last_post.content:
Whether it's malign policy or broken technology, Twitter's disabling of 3rd party apps is only the latest reason why anyone who relies on the bird site should be migrating elsewhere. Mastodon is the best alternative at the moment, but the point is: You cannot trust Elon Musk's -- or anyone else's -- centralized operation.
